channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree growth obstructing traffic lights, 26th June
item.description:
Traffic lights curb side opposite Sainsbuys petrol station are obsructed by tree growth
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree over growing, 26th June
item.description:
Tree is taking over valuable parking. I believe someone came to cut it back a while ago but due to an abandoned vehicle they weren't able to do it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Buttermere Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous for pedestrians crossing the A435, 26th June
item.description:
Road closure sign on crossing from the cut through footpath onto the A435 near Hayfield Way junction. The sign causes an obstruction on this busy crossing used by residents and pupils going to school. I had to step in the road to see past the sign which is very dangerous as cars come very fast around this roundabout. It is a dropped kerb crossing not a crossing where cars have to stop
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 26th June
item.description:
28 day with 2 way traffic lights please cut back overgrown hedges obstructing the footway back to boundary approx 100m x 0.5m x 2m (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 separate man hole covers continually banging every time cars drive over them. This is hroughout the day and night and is driving me a little crazy. There is no peace and it is not acceptable that you have not replied to my earlier notification nearly a week ago. I pay council tax and feel entitled, 26th June
item.description:
Nearest properties 9 & 10 the Podium, Montpellier Terrace. This crossroads is regularly dug up but now we have continual metallic banging noise every time a car drives over one or other of the covers. Itâ€™s a very busy road and so the noise is continual- day and night. It is very stressful and driving me crazy and it has been like this for at least a week. Please confirm that you have received this complaint as my earlier message has not been responded to. (I notified you over the very hot weekend last week when I could not keep my windows open at night as the incorrectly closed man hole cover noise was so bad. I look forward to hearing from you Yours Sincerely Carol Hesford 07889 780730

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 103, Montpellier Terrace, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree has come down across KAN9 footpath, 26th June
